widgets_values: a smile girl in a snowing day
You are an art expert, gracefully describing your knowledge in art domain.

nodes.title: System Prompt
widgets_values:
You are transforming user inputs into descriptive prompts for generating AI Videos. Follow these steps to produce the final description:
1. English Only: The entire output must be written in English with 80-150 words.
2. Concise, Single Paragraph: Begin with a single paragraph that describes the scene, focusing on key actions in sequence.
3. Detailed Actions and Appearance: Clearly detail the movements of characters, objects, and relevant elements in the scene. Include brief, essential visual details that highlight distinctive features.
4. Contextual Setting: Provide minimal yet effective background details that establish time, place, and atmosphere. Keep it relevant to the scene without unnecessary elaboration.
5. Camera Angles and Movements: Mention camera perspectives or movements that shape the viewer’s experience, but keep it succinct.
6. Lighting and Color: Incorporate lighting conditions and color tones that set the scene’s mood and complement the actions.
7. Source Type: Reflect the nature of the footage (e.g., real-life, animation) naturally in the description.
8. No Additional Commentary: Do not include instructions, reasoning steps, or any extra text outside the described scene. Do not provide explanations or justifications—only the final prompt description.

Example Style:
• A group of colorful hot air balloons take off at dawn in Cappadocia, Turkey. Dozens of balloons in various bright colors and patterns slowly rise into the pink and orange sky. Below them, the unique landscape of Cappadocia unfolds, with its distinctive “fairy chimneys” - tall, cone-shaped rock formations scattered across the valley. The rising sun casts long shadows across the terrain, highlighting the otherworldly topography.

The value of server address should be your ComfyUI server ip anddress and port number, e.g. 127.0.0.1:8188.

ComfyUI Web Viewer custom node
https://github.com/VrchStudio/comfyui-web-viewer


ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite
https://github.com/Kosinkadink/ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite

nodes.title: System Prompt
widgets_values:
You are transforming user inputs—descriptions of a video scene—into a single SFX prompt. Follow these rules:

1. **Single Sentence**  
- Output exactly one sentence in English.
2. **Word Limit**  
- The sentence must be 5–15 words long.
3. **Match the Scene**  
- Only describe sounds directly relevant to the user’s video scene.
4. **Present Tense, Sensory Focus**  
- Use present tense and sensory language to convey the sound.
5. **No Additional Commentary**  
- Do not include reasoning, justifications, or bullet points—only the final one-sentence output.

Example Style:
Ice cracking with sharp snapping sound, and metal tool scraping against the ice surface.

nodes.title: Response
widgets_values: A young Asian woman stands alone in a serene winter scene, her smile radiating warmth against the cold backdrop of snow-covered evergreen trees. Her long dark brown hair frames her heart-shaped face, with rosy cheeks and bright blue eyes that sparkle with happiness. She wears a fitted white halter top adorned with intricate white snowflake patterns, adding a touch of elegance to her winter wonderland setting. The soft, fluffy snowflakes gently fall around her, casting a peaceful silence over the scene.

nodes.title: User Prompt

widgets_values:
ltx-video-2b-v0.9.safetensors & ltx-video-2b-v0.9.1.safetensors 

- location: ComfyUI/models/checkpoints/video
- downlaod: 
  - https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video/blob/main/ltx-video-2b-v0.9.safetensors
  - https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video/resolve/main/ltx-video-2b-v0.9.1.safetensors

t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors

- location: ComfyUI/models/clip
- download: https://huggingface.co/comfyanonymous/flux_text_encoders/blob/main/t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn.safetensors

ComfyUI-LTXVideo custom node:
https://github.com/Lightricks/ComfyUI-LTXVideo

ComfyUI-LTXTricks custom node:
https://github.com/logtd/ComfyUI-LTXTricks

Install `ComfyUI-MMAudio` custome node:

- ComfyUI Manager -> Install via Git URL
- url: https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-MMAudio

Download MMAudio used model files

- location: ComfyUI/models/mmaudio
- models:
  - `apple_DFN5B-CLIP-ViT-H-14-384_fp16.safetensors`
  - `mmaudio_large_44k_v2_fp16.safetensors`
  - `mmaudio_synchformer_fp16.safetensors`
  - `mmaudio_vae_44k_fp16.safetensors`
- url: https://huggingface.co/Kijai/MMAudio_safetensors/tree/main

nodes.title: Positive Prompt
widgets_values:
A group of colorful hot air balloons take off at dawn in Cappadocia, Turkey.
Dozens of balloons in various bright colors and patterns slowly rise into the pink and orange sky. Below them, the unique landscape of Cappadocia unfolds, with its distinctive "fairy chimneys" - tall, cone-shaped rock formations scattered across the valley. The rising sun casts long shadows across the terrain, highlighting the otherworldly topography.
